replies.author: Lurenccc
replies.txt_content: 感觉就像是故意的

replies.author: StreamReader
replies.txt_content: 末地的沙雕更多 相信我

replies.author: 魅-内存君
replies.txt_content: 哈吼吼吼结果我也没看出来有什么

replies.author: 苦于数学
replies.txt_content: 我要7级，我要去末地看看

replies.author: 模组唐三
replies.txt_content: 真的，末地的沙雕都是这些人变过来的

replies.author: 缘生
replies.txt_content: 其实茶馆好多帖子我半夜看着也笑出声，全是金粒啊

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content: 7级就能去末路之地了，我也想去看看

replies.author: 专刀你
replies.txt_content: 争取七级去末地

replies.author: Night-夜梦
replies.txt_content: 什么鬼，看不懂emmm

replies.author: Levi_Marvin
replies.txt_content: Spigot:喵喵喵？

replies.author: Kruls
replies.txt_content: 孤小星好像是我举报的。。

replies.author: 白乐
replies.txt_content: 什么东东qwq

replies.author: BlackdevilFred
replies.txt_content: 小黑屋就是讨喜

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 从哪里看？

replies.author: Shu_Ben书本
replies.txt_content:
mohui666 发表于 2020-3-16 09:01
从哪里看？
最下面有

replies.author: 独行
replies.txt_content: 哈哈哈 这些确定不是故意的吗？ 我真想去看看...等等 我好像已经七级了 什么时候的事情...

replies.author: Nurkalyi
replies.txt_content: 还有在末地还水的呢 这算啥 不过水龙头这理由真是笑死了

replies.author: 食人黑鹿
replies.txt_content: 谢谢 有被笑到

replies.author: hyl879
replies.txt_content: 小学生吧 水有啥用哟！！

replies.author: xiao_qiane
replies.txt_content: 末地是啥，都没听过

replies.author: Wei_Dun
replies.txt_content: 等到你7级了，你就知道什么违规更可笑了

replies.author: 克球xkball
replies.txt_content: 红红火火恍恍惚惚都是秀儿，祝你早日七级去末地能有更多沙雕

replies.author: 海贼王索隆
replies.txt_content: 笑死我了。
